name: The Queen (3d-Nahla)
description: Honey thieves Kidnapped the queen bee . They took her away and put her in a prison inside the den . They took all honey jars, and replaced it with fake ones .The guardian discovered what happened in the kingdom of bees . Now he has to do his duty by returning the queen to her kingdom,  destroy the fake ones, and collecting the honey drops on his way.  Of course he will be fighting the evil thieves and will not let them get away after what they done.
